snippet: Amsterdam’s Repair Cafe encourages people to bring old items that they might have otherwise thrown out to have them restored by expert volunteers.
abstract: Amsterdam Journal; Amsterdam's Repair Cafe, in an effort to reduce waste, encourages people to bring old items that they might have otherwise thrown out to have them restored by expert volunteers; local groups have opened thirty similar cafes across the Netherlands.
lead_paragraph: Amsterdam’s Repair Cafe encourages people to bring old items that they might have otherwise thrown out to have them restored by expert volunteers.

headline.seo: Amsterdam Tries to Change Culture With ‘Repair Cafes’
headline.main: An Effort to Bury a Throwaway Culture One Repair at a Time
headline.print_headline: An Effort to Bury A Throwaway Culture One Repair at a Time
